name: Nexter
description:
Nexter is a mini games/news/other compilation for the ZX Spectrum Next.

Regular games include:
Treasure Words (a crossword puzzle)
Jungle Jumble (a picture jumble)
Eyes Out (a 'Lights Out' style puzzle)

It also features a news section and issues may include interviews, music, one-off games and other curiosities.

Any ideas or contributions for future issues are welcome!

Nexter is free to download but if you wish to support future development or show your appreciation, feel free to PayPal Me.
